about_the_game:
MAGICAL STOCK PRINCESS

Gulamesh the Devourer has returned and he is stealing all the food, thus starving the people of the Kingdom. Princess Stock sets on a quest to collect as much food as possible and ultimately defeat Gulamesh!

Magical Stock Princess is a quick to play blend of arcade levels and lite rpg elements. Avoid monsters while you clear the floor in the Gals Panic-loosely inspired Action stages, and interact with quirky characters in the Adventure stages. Enjoy the best of two worlds without the drawbacks. 100% bat caves-free.

FEATURES:

- A mix of arcade action and rpg elements.

- A miniquest-based saving system. Saving doesn't come free, you need to work for it.

- 3 endings plus a special bad ending.

- Secrets, not the usual references and a lighthearted atmosphere.

- Delicious food to collect!


PLAY IT TODAY!



Presented by IFCATS

name: Magical Stock Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
